event.title: Bristol Data Science Meetup
event.description:
We are pleased to announce that the next Bristol Data Scientists Meetup will take place on Thursday December 3rd. 

The meeting will be an informal event aimed at the promotion of and shared learning around Data Science and will consist of a few short presentations followed by networking time over a drink.

Agenda:

6.00pm Arrival and drinks

6.30pm Presentations:

What is a Data Scientist (according to job adverts) - Nigel Marriott,  Marriott Statistical Consulting 

Life Under the Lens: Doing Science on Real Social Networks  - Will Hardman, Elucidata

Reproducible Environments for Analysis - Doug Ashton, Mango Solutions

Following the presentations we would be delighted for everyone to stay on for a chat and a drink.
